Claude CLI response timeout (minutes)

settings.mcpDisableAllTip: Disable all MCP servers at once

Quality evaluation by ministral-3:8b

settings.refreshStatsTip: Fetch the latest item counts and statistics
settings.cleanupMemoryTip:
Clean up infrequently used memories

settings.fontSizeTip: Change font size for all tabs
settings.saveButtonTip: Save all settings to config.json + app_settings.json

mainWindow.settingsSaved: ‚öôÔ∏è Settings saved. (Some settings take effect after restart)
mainWindow.mixAITip:
mixAI - 3Phase Execution Architecture

High-precision orchestration with Claude Code + local LLM team

3Phase:
„ÉªPhase 1: Claude planning (response + LLM instructions)
„ÉªPhase 2: Local LLM sequential execution
„ÉªPhase 3: Claude comparison & integration

Ctrl+Enter to send message
mainWindow.soloAITip:
soloAI - Direct Claude Chat & Settings

Direct conversation with Claude CLI, integrated MCP management.

Sub-tabs:
„ÉªChat: AI conversation
„ÉªSettings: CLI/Ollama settings, MCP management

Ctrl+Enter to send message
mainWindow.infoTip:
Information Collection - Autonomous RAG Pipeline

Store documents and automatically build RAG
with Claude + local LLMs.

3 Steps:
„ÉªStep 1: Claude plan creation
„ÉªStep 2: Local LLM autonomous execution
„ÉªStep 3: Claude quality verification
mainWindow.settingsTip:
General Settings - App-wide Configuration

Display settings, automation options, etc.

Key Features:
„ÉªTheme & font settings
„ÉªAuto-save settings
„ÉªKnowledge/Encyclopedia

mixAI.title: üöÄ mixAI v{version} - 3Phase Orchestration
mixAI.executeTip:
Start 3Phase execution pipeline
(Phase 1: Claude Plan ‚Üí Phase 2: Local LLM ‚Üí Phase 3: Claude Synthesis)
mixAI.engineTip:
P1/P3 Engine: Model used for planning & synthesis
Claude = via API, Local = via Ollama
mixAI.attachTip:
Attach files for Claude CLI
Code, documents, images, etc.
mixAI.historyTip: Search past mixAI conversation history and insert as citation.

mixAI.noOutput: Task processed but no output was generated.

Depth of Claude's reasoning process
OFF: Normal / Standard: Basic / Deep: Detailed
mixAI.phaseDesc: 3Phase: Phase 1 (Planning) ‚Üí Phase 2 (Local LLM Sequential) ‚Üí Phase 3 (Comparison & Synthesis)
mixAI.engineNote: P1/P3 Engine: Select next to the Execute button on Chat tab
mixAI.maxRetriesTip: Max retries of Phase 2 when Phase 3 detects insufficient quality (0 to disable)
mixAI.bibleTip: Display auto-detection, analysis, and injection status of project BIBLE
mixAI.vramTip: Tool for simulating VRAM usage of each GPU
mixAI.vramDesc:
Select models and assign to GPUs to simulate VRAM usage.
Drag & drop to move models between GPUs.

Real-time monitoring of GPU utilization and VRAM consumption
Recording starts automatically during LLM execution

mixAI.gpuAutoDesc: üí° GPU usage is automatically recorded 5 seconds after LLM execution / Use slider to view past data
mixAI.gpuNoData:
No GPU usage data

soloAI.cliUnavailableInstructions:
Claude CLI is not available.

„ÄêSolutions„Äë
1. Run `claude --version` in terminal to check installation
2. Run `claude login` to log in
3. Restart the application

Or switch auth mode to "API (pay-per-use)".
soloAI.modelNotAvailableMsg:
Haiku 4.5 may not be available with this auth method.
Automatically switching to another model and resending.
soloAI.thinkingErrorMsg:
An error occurred with thinking mode via CLI.
Automatically switching to OFF and resending.
<small style='color:#888'>Note: The --think option may not be available depending on your Claude CLI version</small>
